options.name: Whimsical Engineering
options.description: Gnomish cultures take great pride in their tinkering with both magic and machines. Gain +1 Arcanum and +1 Engineering

options.name: Merchants
options.description: Gnomish cultures are famous for their merchants and making trades. Gain +1 Persuasion and +1 Insight. Gain an Additional 1d4 Persuasion when making a deal that involves trade or procuring services for money.

options.name: Polite
options.description: Gnomish cultures preach both patience and speaking quietly, always staying focused and never disturbing their elders. Gain +1 Stealth and +1 Concentration.

options.name: Evasion Training
options.description: Gnomish cultures tend to start avoidance training at a young age to resist the many dangers in their homeland. Gain +1 Dodge and +1 Initiative.

options.name: Higher Education
options.description: Gnomish culture values expertise in a single subject rather than broad learning. Become Good at one Knowledge Skill and the learn the Arcanascript Language.

options.name: Gnomish Ingenuity
options.description: Gnomish cultures are capable and clever engineers and take great pride in their creations. Gain +1 Engineering and +1 Ammocraft. Additionally, Ranged Weapons that you produce have a +1 Damage Bonus and +2 Maximum Range.

options.name: Conduit Attunement
options.description: Gnomish cultures value the bonds between a Conduit and its owner and are taught how to precicely attune to them. When you bond with a Conduit, start with a Common Bond and gain +6 Power and +6 Power Regen.
